quote: You are enough just as you are.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
author: Eleanor Brownn

quote: This too shall pass.
author: Persian Proverb

quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: Every day may not be good... but there’s something good in every day.
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching,Love like you'll never be hurt,Sing like there's nobody listening,And live like it's heaven on earth.
author: William W. Purkey

quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Because paper has more patience than people.
author: Anne Frank

quote: No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Andre Gide

quote: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Gratitude is when memory is stored in the heart and not in the mind.
author: Lionel Hampton

quote: Gratitude shifts your focus from what you lack to the abundance that has always been within you.
author: Brenda Mapane

quote: It is not enough if you just live life as it comes to you like a floating leaf in a pond. Make use of the powers bestowed in you and soar like an eagle.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: They laugh at me because I'm different; I laugh at them because they're all the same.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: So many things are possible as long as you don't know they are impossible.
author: Mildred D. Taylor

quote: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.
author: Zayn Malik

quote: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.
author: H. Jackson Brown

quote: My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it.
author: Judy Blume

quote: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
author: Rumi

quote: It’s your life; you don’t need someone’s permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The desire to reach for the stars is ambitious. The desire to reach hearts is wise.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: I kept always two books in my pocket, one to read, one to write in.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful..
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
author: Rumi

quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
